articles.author: John Owen Nwachukwu
articles.title: World Cup: Ghana legend, Gyang reveals why Morocco beat Belgium 2-0 in Qatar - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Former Ghanaian striker, Asamoah Gyang, has reacted to Moroccan 2-0 win over world number two football nation, Belgium, in the World Cup on Sunday. Goals from Zakaria Aboukhlal and Abdelhamid Sabiri secured Morocco's famous win over the European giants. The w…
articles.content:
Former Ghanaian striker, Asamoah Gyang, has reacted to Moroccan 2-0 win over world number two football nation, Belgium, in the World Cup on Sunday.
Goals from Zakaria Aboukhlal and Abdelhamid Sabiri… [+759 chars]

articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: Hubble Space Telescope image shows galaxies merge 671M light-years away - New York Post
articles.description: Scientists at NASA and the European Space Agency (ESA) released an image on Friday showcasing a pair of merging galaxies.
articles.content:
Scientists at NASA and the European Space Agency (ESA) released an image on Friday showcasing a pair of merging galaxies. 
The galaxy merger, known as Arp-Madore 417-391, is located 671 million ligh… [+817 chars]
